name: TankU
description:
TankU is a fast-paced, top-down local multiplayer tank shooter that will keep you on the edge of your seat!  Collect power-ups and use them to gain an edge over your opponents, such as a heal, increased fire rate, and even multi-shot! With intuitive controls and intense action, TankU is the ultimate tank-shooting experience for players of all skill levels.

Developed by:

  • Gerwin Trip
  • Ivana Wissink
  • Saph Geuzinge
  • Stephan Knobben
